{
  DO ZOOM_TO                                  10 18 1250
  IF ( INT_GAME_TURN == 0 )
  {
  }
  ELSE
  {
  }
  ENDIF
  EVERY 129 11
  {
    IF ( INT_GAME_TURN == 0 )
    {
      SET $0                                    1
    }
    ELSE
    {
      SET $0                                    0
    }
    ENDIF
    IF ( $0 != 0 )
    {
      SET $0                                    10
    }
    ENDIF
  }
}
SCRIPT_END
